ygData.subject: Re: LESSER SHIELDING
ygData.msgSnippet: they have changed how invis works- everyone will be indifferent to you if they cannot see you; you have to uncloak (star trek-ism) to find out how they really
ygData.messageBody:
they have changed how invis works- everyone will be indifferent to you if
they cannot see you; you have to uncloak (star trek-ism) to find out how
they really feel about you. and yes, i learned this the hard way.

belphenor


>From: "James" <manickd@...>
>
> So you know. I was killed in fithwell after I con a guard. It said
>indfferently. So I uninvised my self. Well the gm said that thats just
>faction standing, and has nothing t do with ratial hatried when you con
>something. Kind of silly isnt it.
>
>
> question: I killed a lot of ORCS so I am indifferent from most guards
>I see now . . .
>
> but, I need to buy my lesser shielding spell and was wondering if I
>will be KOS inside felwithe . . . anyone know?
>
> I mean if guards outside are not KOS I should be ok inside buying
>spells right?
>
